summary:
**Watchmen** is a popular comic book series created by Alan Moore, Dave Gibbons, and John Higgins in the 1980s. It tells a story set in an alternate world where superheroes exist and have changed history. The story follows retired superheroes who are brought back together to investigate a murder.

The comic is known for its complex plot, unique art style, and use of fake documents. It won many awards and was even made into a movie and TV show. Despite its success, the creator, Alan Moore, doesn't agree that it made comics "grow up." He thinks it just appealed to older readers.
title: Watchmen
